data.text:
@EU_Commission Not to mention that most EU investments end up in construction that serves no goal, corruption or is just lost and no one knows where..... 
Or just to line the pockets of EU officials and their friends. It's a complete waste as theft of taxpayer money.

@EU_Commission That is a huge increase with a recession pending and will have to be paid by taxpayers in only 7 of the 27 net contributors. In countries where the tax percentage is already high. Further decreasing demand in an already underperforming EU in regard to rest of the world. STUPID!
@EU_Commission Tanto, la voce dei cittadini, non l'ascoltate mai. Sono più importanti gli interessi delle lobby bancarie.
@EU_Commission ...cci vostra riprendevi il giuda prodi e chi gli detto' l'ordine di smantellare l'industria italiana ...meerd

@EU_Commission #stop_internet_ban_iraq
The current Iraqi gover. cut off the Internet for Iraqis a few hours ago, although it committed horrendous massacres of the Iraqi people despite the claim of their rights. Please convey the voice of all Iraqis to international organizations & UN Security!

@EU_Commission #stop_internet_ban_iraq
The current Iraqi gover. cut off the Internet for Iraqis a few hours ago, although it committed horrendous massacres of the Iraqi people despite the claim of their rights. Please convey the voice of all Iraqis to international organizations & UN Security!
@EU_Commission Really? Advertising with a wingsuit ...
@EU_Commission Meglio di no che poi vi tocca trovarvi un lavoro vero.
@EU_Commission Not guilty.
@EU_Commission Prrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr! 💩
@EU_Commission You get a like. #TYTEurope. (But first I need you, @TheYoungTurks)

@EU_Commission Supprimer tous les hauts fonctionnaires, les commissions, conseils avantages natures . Supprimez les subventions aux associations terroristes renvoyez les diasporas islamistes . Et appliquez en France la tolérance zéro. Après on aura un peu de considération pour vous.
@EU_Commission Tous les jours  l'Europe  célébre quelque chose..ils travaillent quand?
@EU_Commission more work needed :) let's make a change for the future of life on earth
@EU_Commission Ok parliamo di CLANDESTINI?? Sono pronto: non si può continuare così! Dovete occuparci del problema!! Se volete una mano: chiamatemi
@EU_Commission # free ferrer. Cuba is een dictatuur free ferrer .
@EU_Commission @Twitter isn't this political advertising?

@EU_Commission Sorry these are unadjusted figures that do not take account of different education, working less/more and different jobs. The pay gap is much smaller when controlling for such variables. You dont even mention that! Very misleading!
@EU_Commission Will the Nobel have the Biological prize?

@EU_Commission I know women managers that don't want to hire other women because of pregnancy. Instead of focusing on fake wage gap we should focus on insentives of having more babies like getting paid by the state not from the employer (who wants to pay someone that doesn't come to the office?

@EU_Commission This is really annoying coming from European commission while the wage gap has been debunked 100s of times. With all our tax money you should have some good analysts/scientists that explain you how to read the stats no?
@EU_Commission Dai, chiudetela qui. Vi beccate solo rispostacce
@EU_Commission Facebook NELSON LARICCIA bienvenidos se enteren @nelsonlariccia @nelsonlariccia5
@EU_Commission Does that mean a woman needs to work 5 more career years for same revenue as male equivalent?
@EU_Commission Climate action not being taken seriously by Irish government ie Solar projects being held up as no tariffs as there are for Wind. If put in place would help ensure meet EU targets
@EU_Commission #EqualPay is enshrined in Art. 37 of the Italian constitution: it came into force on 1st January 1948, i.e. more than 70 years ago...

@EU_Commission That's an important topic. However, consider highlighting instead the serious gap between salaries of ALL genders, amongst EU countries. Salaries are inequivalent (comparing similar jobs & working hours) amongst EU colleagues, for both women & men alike. Many thanks. #EqualPayDay
@EU_Commission Qu’on rende le pouvoir au #parlementEuropeen plutôt que développer des actions ridicules.

@EU_Commission Partecipo con entusiasmo! 
Voglio far sentire la mia voce! 
Il tema che più mi sta a cuore 
è la vostra ineluttabile, immediata e definitiva scomparsa.

@EU_Commission EU does nothing for me as it does not respect my democratic choice and I am not represented in EU  EU allows that one of its MS is breaching fundamental Human Rights within EU territory. #ShameonEU
@EU_Commission Tipo dare soldi per le corride? Che vi potessero incornare tutti i tori della Spagna 🤮🤦‍♀️😱

@EU_Commission As is shown in its publications, the Commission is aware that the 16% is the average pay difference between men and women. Why does the Commission present this data in this tweet misleadingly as the pay difference between men and women in the same job?
@EU_Commission Schifisi bastardi. Spero scoppi presto il vostro lurido castello di menzogne.
@EU_Commission Blessing...❤
@EU_Commission Ma annate affanculo immediatamente!!
@EU_Commission Great! I want to get the same salary like my female boss....
@EU_Commission Nothing totally corrupted and #SpainIsAFascitEstate
@EU_Commission where is my vote?
@EU_Commission I'm Catalan. #WhereIsMyVote. #ShameOnYou . #SpainIsAFascistState.
@EU_Commission I'm not sure if a fail or a joke.
@EU_Commission Really??? Are you pulling my leg?? Ask @KRLS  my vote is on his hands and you block it. EU_Circus may be.. you losted 2,5 M citizens, remember it when ask our votes again!
@EU_Commission #SpainIsAFascitEstate
@EU_Commission Close the gap already! Women are worth more than men in general anyhow. @RevolveMediaCo is equal opportunity and equal employer in #Europe!
@EU_Commission Arrêtez de dépenser notre pognon 💰 dans la pub. Allez bosser pour justifier votre paie.

@EU_Commission Mi fa piacere che venga usata, oltre all'Italiano, anche e spesso la lingua Inglese per le vostre comunicazioni.
Fino adesso vi hanno insegnato qualcosa, in merito allo sfottimento dei sudditi, e l'uso del tedesco avrebbe un altro effetto, vero?

@EU_Commission Nach den Erfahrungen während #SaveYourInternet schätze ich mal dass  "etwas bewirken" heißt dass  Bürger*innen die Anliegen vorbringen von MEPs im @Europarl_EN und @EU_Commission als #bots, #mob oder gekauft dargestellt und am Ende ignoriert werden um die Lobbies zu füttern 🤬.
@EU_Commission @EU_Eurostat 😂 because of import from Africa and Middle East ...

@EU_Commission Depuis quand une dictature qui ne dit pas son nom demande t elle l’avis du peuple ?
Les français ne sont pas dupes de cette hypocrisie 
Gopés uber alles 
FrexitVite
@EU_Commission You lie, you cheat and you steal!
@EU_Commission This can't be possible

@EU_Commission Fair point but can then be expanded to fair pair for men and women of all age groups. I know men doing same job of other men who get paid less. #fairpay #EqualityForAll #EqualPayDay2019
@EU_Commission Women need to be stronger.
@EU_Commission Is this you trying work towards a level playingfield wit the uk?
@EU_Commission @FedericaMog Je suis citoyenne européenne mais aussi française mais je suis pour l'europe
@EU_Commission Unless you live in France, or Catalonia. Try making your voice heard and we will beat the living shit out of you

@EU_Commission The #EU fails to stick to its founding values of democracy, rule of law and human rights, in case of #Spain's severe violations of them. So i don't expect much of a serious backing of these new #ClimateChange rules.

@EU_Commission @EU_Commission #Equality goes #bothways: Let's also start closing post-separation #sharedparentinggap kept in place by #EuropeanCommission and #EUwomen in claiming shared #children as female's #singleparent #personalproperty and #familydividend. #EqualPayDay #Sharedparentingday
@EU_Commission @PieterHendrikse So you lower the wages of men. You morons.

@EU_Commission IMO ITER generating Electricity should be a priority,spending billions only on Theory when EU spends € 350 billion a year to buy imported Oil+Gas is absurd+not smart. CERN also should focus on Space Propulsion for Tourism,not just expensive Conferences & soiree's about Theory
@EU_Commission The Irish government is using it as a revenue gathering exercise.The working class and elderly and less well off are suffering while our government is corrupt.
@EU_Commission Read today's New York Times. This may give you some idea what's going on.
@EU_Commission Stop the move to censor political views on social media within the EU, You may not like some of them but put up a counter argument rather than censorship.

@EU_Commission What I don’t understand is how companies can compete and survive paying men 16% more than women for the same job. 
There should be so many more unemployed men if women were willing to do the same job for less.

@EU_Commission Acum este alt prezent

Prezent, doar, doar al gândiri

Femeile sunt cu o capacitate mai ușoară de acceptare a prezentului, față de bărbați

Iar prezentului gândiri, prezența femeii, valorează mai mult decât prezența bărbătească

Așa că

Doar ei continuă studiile

Na

Eu nu doresc

@EU_Commission In t'he Spanish jail, for instance.
#SpainIsAFascitEstate
@EU_Commission Desidero con tutto il cuore che il prima possibile la UE sparisca
@EU_Commission Cette chiasse de commission européenne vient même nous salir sur tweeter.
@EU_Commission u know that this AVERAGE figure compares apples with strawberries

@EU_Commission Ottimo! Per esempio... Una bella iniziativa potrebbe essere la disgregazione del fogno €uropeo. Che tempi abbiamo? Dobbiamo segnarci in agenda la scaletta delle cose da fare, per poi organizzare la festa.
@EU_Commission Not In France with Macron's dictature
@EU_Commission La mia idea? Chiudere quella roba dannosa, ipocrita e succhiasangue detta Parlamento europeo. E tutto il resto di conseguenza

@EU_Commission an estimated 1.7 million tonnes of fish and other marine animals are being thrown back into the sea each year.
They are discarded because the fishermen are not allowed to keep them as per EU rules. Same for agriculture wonky veg or fruits not allowed in shops.

@EU_Commission I believe that individuals who have a partner with higher income may earn on average 16% less, no matter if they are male or female.

This is a statistical issue that should be technically clarified, not a political position.
@EU_Commission Maybe we should pick the best practice Countries and follow their blueprint be it in Healthcare , Education , Environment , and Housing ..
@EU_Commission Hi @EU_Commission, what about the pay gap between different EU states? Shall we close that gap as well? Or #EqualPayDay, but only for some?
@EU_Commission The Gender Pay Gap is a myth. Stop spreading fake news please. See here: Warren Farrell - Why Men Earn More

@EU_Commission @DhubEurope Thank you for highlighting such an important topic.  Please consider making these videos accessible to blind people, and people with visual impairment by having audio of the text.  Many thanks. #SilentSubtitlesAreNotAccessible
@BlindUnion @euroblind
@EU_Commission @b@bv@mmh ####
@EU_Commission @WebSummit Ask me about..... why Tony Blair & Michelle Barnier and @Huawei_Europe are speaking 🤔
@EU_Commission @kitkatninja It’s also when symbolically Disabled workers also stop getting paid.

@EU_Commission @EUScienceInnov Challenges (#MDPI) launches a Special Issue in association with inVIVO Planetary Health:  manuscripts will deal with  planetary health, climate change, biodiversity loss,  actions towards decreasing global warming,  greenhouse gases containment, alternative energy sources, ...
@EU_Commission Gender pay gap is a myth. Start working on CEO/employee pay gap. Thanks
@EU_Commission @MarkLazarus8 I will register ours and see what happens
@EU_Commission Pensioni max 60 anni per tutti questa è l'Europa che vorrei a misura d'uomo.

@EU_Commission @ajmalshahdin I request to European Commission,.please also take notice & give statement on the Pakistani Media who's not paying outstanding Salaries & Dues of their terminated employees. & that employees were terminated without any Notice.
@EU_Commission Meno ore di lavoro per far lavorare tutti e per rendere le aziende ancora più efficienti.
@EU_Commission @SihameElk Best starting with yourselfs at the EU 😂🤣 equalpayday workers at EU 1 day for a normal worker 1 month! @peeters_kris1 @GeertBourgeois
@EU_Commission At EC you have employees, well paid to create ideas. If they don't know, fire them!
@EU_Commission Could you please provide the data how this is calculated? Is the comparison between full time men and women doing the same job?
@EU_Commission Transparency you say? Well publish the minutes online then of the @vonderleyen meeting this week with Tony Blair.

@EU_Commission Hola bon dia!I el dia de les dones que voten democraticament com jo i els hi anul.len els candidats que son votats per 1 milió de persones?Espero que la @EU_Commission faci la seva feina i resolgui aquest conflicte europeu amb les dones que hem votat @KRLS @toni_comin @junqueras
@EU_Commission I demand pay equality for men working after leaving university, women earn more and that is wrong.

@EU_Commission How about improving administrative procedures of #EU institutions for starters? I have been an employee of the #EuropeanParliament since August and have not received a single pay cheque up to date. @Europarl_EN

@EU_Commission I just don't get it in this day & age. When I was employing ppl I put up a job ad with a salary range (starting & up to based on performance etc.) & whoever got the job got the pay. It never even entered my head to pay anyone differently, that was the salary for that job role! 🤷‍♂️
@EU_Commission But if it comes to transparency of the EU, it's decisions or appointment of high officials it's more comparable to the Soviet Union. Hypocrisy anyone?
@EU_Commission For girls and women out there #EqualPayDay #GirlsInTech
